alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Cortland; Schuyler; Tioga; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 6:02PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Seneca, Schuyler, south central Cayuga, southwestern Cortland, northern Chemung, northern Tioga and Tompkins Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 602 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Montour Falls, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ithaca, Newfield, Cayuga Heights, Lansing, Enfield, Danby, Caroline, Groton, Covert and Locke. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
